**Reactor**: BSTR

**Given**: $\Delta H_1 = -41.2 \text{ kJ mol}^{-1}$, $k_{0,1} = 8110 \text{ L mol}^{-1} \text{ s}^{-1}$, $E_1 = 74.8 \text{ kJ mol}^{-1}$, $T_0 = \left( 180 + 273.15 \right) \text{ K}$, $C_{A,0} = 2.9 \text{ mol L}^{-1}$, $C_{B,0} = 3.2 \text{ mol L}^{-1}$, $\tilde{C}_p = 1.23 \text{ cal g}^{-1} \text{ K}^{-1}$, $\rho = 1.02 \text{ g cm}^{-3}$, and $t_{\text{rxn}} = 2 \text{ h}$.

**Basis**: $V = 1 \text{ L}$.

**Requested**: $C_A$, $C_B$, $C_Y$, $C_Z$, and $T$, all *vs*. $t$.

**Reactor Model**:

$$
\frac{dn_A}{dt} = -r_1V \tag{3}
$$

$$
\frac{dn_B}{dt} = -r_1V \tag{4}
$$

$$
\frac{dn_Y}{dt} = r_1V \tag{5}
$$

$$
\frac{dn_Z}{dt} = r_1V \tag{6}
$$

$$
\frac{dT}{dt} = \frac{- r_1 \Delta H_1}{\rho \tilde{C}_p} \tag{7}
$$

**Ancillary Equations**

$$
k_1 = k_{0,1}\exp{\left( \frac{-E_1}{RT} \right)} \tag{8}
$$

$$
C_A = \frac{n_A}{V} \tag{9}
$$

$$
C_B = \frac{n_B}{V} \tag{10}
$$

$$
n_A\Big\vert_{t=0} = n_{A,0} = C_{A,0}V \tag{11}
$$

$$
n_B\Big\vert_{t=0} = n_{B,0} = C_{B,0}V \tag{12}
$$

$$
n_Y\Big\vert_{t=0} = n_{Y,0} = 0 \tag{13}
$$

$$
n_Z\Big\vert_{t=0} = n_{Z,0} = 0 \tag{14}
$$

$$
T\Big\vert_{t=0} = T_0 \tag{15}
$$

$$
\text{Stopping criterion: } t = t_{\text{rxn}} \tag{16}
$$

**Response**

$$
C_Y = \frac{n_Y}{V} \tag{17}
$$

$$
C_Z = \frac{n_Z}{V} \tag{18}
$$

**Calculations**

1. Substitute given quantities, basis and equation (2) into all other equations.
2. Substitute equations (8) through (10) into equations (3) through (7).
3. Solve equations (3) through (7) using the initial values in equations (11) through (15) and the stopping criterion in equation (16) to obtain $n_A$, $n_B$, $n_Y$, $n_Z$, and $T$ versus $t$ in the range $0 \le t \le t_{\text{rxn}}$.
4. Calculate $C_A$, $C_B$, $C_Y$, and $C_Z$ at each time using equations (9), (10), (17), and (18).
5. Plot $C_A$, $C_B$, $C_Y$, $C_Z$, and $T$ *vs*. $t$.
